Information for international students at AGH University
Each and every international student studying at our University interested in AGH University Student Campus (Miasteczko Studenckie AGH) dorm allocation in the academic year 2024/25 should:

Log in to the information system at: 
https://akademik.agh.edu.pl/

Fill in the “AGH University international students“ online form in the system. Please do not print the form.
